scripts.init: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.postinstall: cd lm-app && npm i && cd ../lm-statics && npm i
scripts.copy:dev: cp -r src/ dist.developpment && find dist.developpment/ -maxdepth 100 -type f -name "*.ts" -delete
scripts.copy:prod: cp -r src/ dist.production && find dist.developpment/ -maxdepth 100 -type f -name "*.ts" -delete
scripts.transpile-all:dev: npm run empty:dev && npm run copy:dev && npm run transpile-ts:dev
scripts.transpile-all:prod: npm run empty:prod && npm run copy:prod && npm run transpile-ts:prod
scripts.dev: npx concurrently -n 'transpile,serve----' 'npm run transpile-all:dev' 'npm run serve:dev'
scripts.dev:watch: npx concurrently -n 'transpile,serve----' 'npm run transpile-all:dev:watch' 'npm run serve:dev:watch'
scripts.prod: npx concurrently -n 'transpile,serve----' 'npm run transpile-all:prod' 'npm run serve:prod'
